title: Wood Fencing Fayetteville, NC & Sanford | Privacy & Picket | RWF
description: Custom wood fencing installation in Fayetteville and Sanford, NC. Privacy, picket, and split rail fences. Pressure-treated pine and cedar options.
keywords: Wood fencing, Privacy fence, Picket fence, Split rail fence, Cedar fencing, Fayetteville fencing contractor, Sanford wood fence

headings.text: Custom Wood Fencing Installation in Fayetteville & Sanford

serviceOptions.title: Privacy Fences
serviceOptions.description: Solid wood panels create a secluded backyard retreat, blocking views and reducing noise for maximum privacy.

serviceOptions.title: Picket Fences
serviceOptions.description: Add traditional charm to your front yard with a picket fence that defines boundaries while maintaining an open feel.

serviceOptions.title: Split Rail Fences
serviceOptions.description: Perfect for larger properties, split rail fences offer a rustic look that defines property lines without obstructing views.

serviceOptions.title: Shadowbox Fences
serviceOptions.description: A 'good neighbor' fence that looks great from both sides, allowing airflow while providing semi-privacy.

serviceOptions.title: Board-on-Board
serviceOptions.description: Overlapping boards ensure complete privacy even as the wood shrinks, offering a sturdy and attractive barrier.

benefits.title: Customizable Designs
benefits.description: From picket to privacy, wood can be tailored to any height and style to match your home.

benefits.title: Natural Aesthetics
benefits.description: Blends seamlessly with landscaping for a warm, organic look that vinyl or aluminum can't duplicate.

benefits.title: Affordability
benefits.description: Wood fencing is a budget-friendly option that delivers high value, durability, and return on investment.

benefits.title: Eco-Friendly
benefits.description: Crafted from renewable materials like pine and cedar, making it an environmentally responsible choice.

faqs.question: How often should I stain my wood fence?
faqs.answer: We recommend staining or sealing your wood fence every 2-3 years to protect it from moisture and UV damage.

faqs.question: What is the best wood for fencing in NC?
faqs.answer: Pressure-treated pine is the most popular due to its resistance to rot and termites. Cedar is also an excellent option for its natural resistance and beauty.

faqs.question: Do you warranty your wood fences?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a lifetime warranty on the craftsmanship of our wood gates, ensuring they won't sag.
